item.title: Offline Email with Isync
item.description: Isync Install isync using your package manager, here we are installing the apt package manager, but use whatever package manager you are using: sudo apt update && sudo apt install isync We will use isync program to download mails to local Maildir folder. We can also use a program called offlineimap which is a bit slower but it can work on Windows. NOTE: isync is the name of the project, mbsync is the name of the executable.
